prompt_text: A wild goblin jumps out from behind a tree, ready to attack!

win.message: You bravely defeat the goblin and celebrate your victory!

loss.message: The goblin overpowers you! You are knocked down!

injury.message: You manage to defeat the goblin, but not without injury.

prompt_text: A ferocious wolf appears out of the bushes, baring its teeth!

win.message: You skillfully outmaneuver the wolf and bring it down!

loss.message: The wolf attacks fiercely and you are left helpless.

injury.message: You manage to scare off the wolf, but you get scratched in the process.

prompt_text: You encounter a deep chasm blocking your path.

success.message: You make a daring leap and land safely on the other side!

failure.message: You miscalculate your jump and hurt yourself in the fall.

success.message: You find a sturdy bridge and cross safely.

failure.message: The bridge is unstable and you fall while crossing.

prompt_text: A large boulder blocks your path completely.

success.message: You muster all your strength and push the boulder aside!

failure.message: You strain yourself trying to push the boulder and feel pain.

success.message: You cleverly find a way around the boulder and continue your journey.

failure.message: While navigating around, you trip and hurt yourself.

prompt_text: You meet a mysterious old woman who offers you something.

success.message: The old woman gifts you a health potion!

failure.message: The woman turns away, leaving you empty-handed.

success.message: You wisely choose to leave her be.

failure.message: The woman curses you for ignoring her!

prompt_text: A cloaked figure appears, offering you a mysterious deal.

success.message: The figure gives you a health potion!

failure.message: The deal turns out to be a scam; you get nothing.

success.message: You wisely refuse and continue on your journey.
